name: Equiv.Perm.sumCongrHom.card_range
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Fintype (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Equiv.Perm.sumCongrHom α β).range x)
inst✝ : Fintype (Prod (Equiv.Perm α) (Equiv.Perm β))
⊢ Eq (Fintype.card (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Equiv.Perm.sumCongrHom α β).range x)) (Fintype.card (Prod (Equiv.Perm α) (Equiv.Perm β)))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sumCongrHom.card_range {α β : Type*} [Fintype (sumCongrHom α β).range]
    [Fintype (Perm α × Perm β)] :
    Fintype.card (sumCongrHom α β).range = Fintype.card (Perm α × Perm β) :=
  Fintype.card_eq.mpr ⟨(ofInjective (sumCongrHom α β) sumCongrHom_injective).symm⟩

name: Equiv.Perm.sigmaCongrRightHom.card_range
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
β : α → Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Fintype (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Equiv.Perm.sigmaCongrRightHom β).range x)
inst✝ : Fintype ((a : α) → Equiv.Perm (β a))
⊢ Eq (Fintype.card (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Equiv.Perm.sigmaCongrRightHom β).range x)) (Fintype.card ((a : α) → Equiv.Perm (β a)))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sigmaCongrRightHom.card_range {α : Type*} {β : α → Type*}
    [Fintype (sigmaCongrRightHom β).range] [Fintype (∀ a, Perm (β a))] :
    Fintype.card (sigmaCongrRightHom β).range = Fintype.card (∀ a, Perm (β a)) :=
  Fintype.card_eq.mpr ⟨(ofInjective (sigmaCongrRightHom β) sigmaCongrRightHom_injective).symm⟩

name: Equiv.Perm.subtypeCongrHom.card_range
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
p : α → Prop
inst✝² : DecidablePred p
inst✝¹ : Fintype (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Equiv.Perm.subtypeCongrHom p).range x)
inst✝ : Fintype (Prod (Equiv.Perm (Subtype fun a => p a)) (Equiv.Perm (Subtype fun a => Not (p a))))
⊢ Eq (Fintype.card (Subtype fun x => Membership.mem (Equiv.Perm.subtypeCongrHom p).range x)) (Fintype.card (Prod (Equiv.Perm (Subtype fun a => p a)) (Equiv.Perm (Subtype fun a => Not (p a)))))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem subtypeCongrHom.card_range {α : Type*} (p : α → Prop) [DecidablePred p]
    [Fintype (subtypeCongrHom p).range] [Fintype (Perm { a // p a } × Perm { a // ¬p a })] :
    Fintype.card (subtypeCongrHom p).range =
      Fintype.card (Perm { a // p a } × Perm { a // ¬p a }) :=
  Fintype.card_eq.mpr ⟨(ofInjective (subtypeCongrHom p) (subtypeCongrHom_injective p)).symm⟩
